SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PO.PURCHASE_ID, PO.ACCOUNT_ID, PO.ORDER_ID, PO.PRODUCT_ID, PO.COMPANY_ID, PO.EMPLOYEE_ID, PO.REG_DATE, PO.UPDATE_DATE, PO.STORAGE_IN_DATE, PO.COUNT_PURCHASE, PO.SUPPLY_PRICE, PO.CONDITION_NOTE_PAYABLE, PO.PURCHASE_STATE, A.ACCOUNT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, ST.KOR_NAME AS STATE_NAME FROM PURCHASE_ORDER PO JOIN ACCOUNT A ON PO.ACCOUNT_ID = A.ACCOUNT_ID JOIN PRODUCT P ON PO.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON PO.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PO.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN STATE ST ON PO.PURCHASE_STATE = ST.CODE ) WHERE PURCHASE_ID = #{var1} AND ACCOUNT_ID = #{var2}
